creditline: Gift of Don and Diana Lee Lucker
description: white marble with grey flecks carved into a square water maze; 2 square openings at center on one side
text: Part of a larger complex of fountains, water flows into one of the openings at the back of this maze from a hidden source. The water courses its way through the maze and out through the second opening in the back. As water in the desert region of Rajasthan is scarce, fountains such as this one are used only on very special occasions.
title: Maze Fountain
